pages.name: showIf
pages.description:
Basic/Legacy mode: one parent, one expected value, and/or/not operands.

Advanced mode: build your own logical statement, multiple parents, multiple operands and build in functions.

pages.name: inputFields
pages.description: Text, password, cidr and ip field types

pages.name: dynamicSubsection
pages.description: Mutable number of subsections, driven from a subsection template

pages.name: slider
pages.description: Select a number from a defined discrete range

pages.name: dependentList
pages.description: List of items, defined according to selected option

pages.name: subsectionsTuple
pages.description: For each subsection from section A match a subsection from section B

pages.name: genericRange
pages.description: Batch of Number component, with shared min and max value, which can be set start and end value for each Number

pages.name: genericSelect
pages.description: Batch of Select component, with the same options
